Name: Shallow Swing
About the game: Are you ok Bubbles? You look a bit like... shrinking?! ------------------------------------- Shallow Swing is a little puzzling story of a little square named Bubbles. She likes to travel, but it is a rough world out there. She takes a breath and tries to reach the next exit. Next level... Next life... Join Bubbles in this tiny adventure and see if you can breath at the right time. ;) ------------------------------------- Shallow Swing is a minimalistic puzzle platformer. Plan your route and drive carefully. ------------------------------------- All soundtrack playlist by Kevin MacLeod Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License Further licence info on our web site.
